issue.title: WFS 1.1 compliancy
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Currently, PROXY only support WFS in its version 1.0

An evolution would be to support the obligatory part of WFS 1.1 specification (http://www.opengeospatial.org/standards/wfs).

_WFS 2.0 is also available but, as it is a brand-new spec., it has no need to be integrated in PROXY (no tierce OGC server implement it so far...)_

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Some good news about WFS 2.0.0 :

Negeo and Opengeo will implement WFS 2.0 in Geoserver : http://twitter.com/neogeo_fr/status/58116037694074880

More info about WFS 2.0.0 in french : http://www.neogeo-online.net/blog/archives/561/
